SENT.plain: X-linked lymphoproliferative disease (XLP) is triggered by Epstein-Barr virus
This virus is also associated with Burkitt lymphoma, a tumor that carries specific chromosome translocations
No such chromosome translocations have been observed in an analysis of XLP-derived cell lines
One XLP patient was found also to have Klinefelter syndrome, having inherited two copies of his maternal XLP-carrying X chromosome
